short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to add comments to popular real estate listing websites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to add the ability to comment on popular real estate listing websites such as Zillow, Redfin, Trulia, and more. Get pricing and opinions on listings in your area.
